title: Google Voice
summary: Google Voice is a telephone service that provides call forwarding and voicemail services, voice and text messaging, as well as U.S. and international call termination for Google Account customers[1] in the U.S., and for Google Workspace (formerly G Suite until October 2020[2]) customers in Canada, Denmark, France, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the UK.[3] The service was launched by Google[4] on March 11, 2009.  A Wired blog post quoted a figure of 3.5Â million users in 2013.[5]
